topics.body:
Oh yeah, I just remembered something I meant to mention about wolf children

In the scene where yuki and ame are fighting, notice that they bring their mouths to each other's necks and faces but never actually bite down
Dogs (and I assume wolves) actually do that. They don't actually intend to hurt each other. My older dog does it to my younger dog all the time if she wants him to back off. Although it's not nearly as dramatic since the older dog is way smaller than the young one and the young one is a huge chicken. 
It's like a canine argument. I thought it was a good added detail
